special_text:
[+1]: You may discard a card, sacrifice another nonland permanent, or pay 3 life. If you do, draw a card.
[-2]: You may discard a card, sacrifice another nonland permanent, or pay 3 life. If you do, target opponent discards a card, sacrifices a nonland permanent, and loses 3 life.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature dies, you may exile it from its owner’s graveyard. If you do, until your next end step, you may cast copies of the exiled card.”
